code: import React from'react';import{CommandType}from'../../../commands/commandTypes';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TypeSpecificFields=props=>{const{commandData,onFieldChange}=props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[commandData.type===CommandType.Navigate&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["URL:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"url",value:commandData.url||"",onChange:onFieldChange})]}),commandData.type===CommandType.Copy&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Text to Copy:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"textToCopy",value:commandData.textToCopy||"",onChange:onFieldChange})]})]});};export default TypeSpecificFields;
